main event: A flying object was observed by military personnel and civilians in Saigon, Indo-China on multiple occasions in 1952.
interesting points: The first sighting involved a round luminous object reported by military personnel,The object was seen moving rapidly across the sky and changing direction multiple times,One civilian aircraft pilot reported a peculiar object hovering over Saigon Port,Observations lasted between 2 to 15 minutes,All sightings occurred under good visibility with no associated noise from the objects.
sighted object: circular flying object, white in color
